page.title: 13AT HOME
page.content: We get home from school and change into our casual clothes, putting our school clothes into the{washing {machine.}We go into the{kitchen}and get something to eat from the{fridge. We then go upstairs to do our homework, while eating our snack. When we have finished our{homework}we go into the{lounge}and watch{television, and on it there could be chat shows, comedy or soap operas. Most people have tea at 17.30. We normally have a two course meal(savoury, then sweet). After tea we may get tired so we will have a hot{bath,}put on our nightclothes and go to bed. In the morning we get up and get ready for school, then have{breakfast}of cereals or toast. Sometimes we watch breakfast television. During weekends and holidays we can stay in bed later.When we get up we can watch children's t.v.
